1: -module(dialyzer_utils_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -export([all/0,
    4:          p_map_implements_map/1,
    5:          p_map_handles_errors_like_map_does/1,
    6:          p_map_preserves_ordering/1
    7:          ]).
    8: 
    9: all() ->
   10:     [p_map_implements_map,
   11:      p_map_handles_errors_like_map_does,
   12:      p_map_preserves_ordering
   13:     ].
   14: 
   15: p_map_implements_map(_Config) ->
   16:     Fun = fun (N) -> N + 2 end,
   17:     List = [2,1,3,2],
   18:     Expected = lists:map(Fun, List),
   19:     Expected = dialyzer_utils:p_map(Fun, List).
   20: 
   21: p_map_handles_errors_like_map_does(_Config) ->
   22:     Fun = fun (3) -> throw("an error"); (N) -> N + 2 end,
   23:     List = [2,1,3,2],
   24:     ListsOk =
   25:       try
   26:         lists:map(Fun, List),
   27:         false
   28:       catch _:_ ->
   29:         true
   30:       end,
   31:     case ListsOk of
   32:       true -> ok;
   33:       false -> ct:fail("Expected lists:map/2 to throw")
   34:     end,
   35:     UtilsOk =
   36:       try
   37:         dialyzer_utils:p_map(Fun, List),
   38:         false
   39:       catch _:_ ->
   40:         true
   41:       end,
   42:     case UtilsOk of
   43:       true -> ok;
   44:       false -> ct:fail("Expected dialyzer_utils:p_map/2 to throw")
   45:     end.
   46: 
   47: p_map_preserves_ordering(_Config) ->
   48:     Fun = fun (N) -> timer:sleep(N * 50), N + 2 end,
   49:     List = [2,1,3,2,1,5,2,1,3,2,9,4,2,1,3,2,5,4],
   50:     Expected = lists:map(Fun, List),
   51:     Expected = dialyzer_utils:p_map(Fun, List).
   52:
